products.title: Day & Night Brushed Oyster
products.description: The day & night brushed oyster roller blind is a practical and stylish alternative to a venetian blind. The textured sandy-coloured stripes makes this blind a great choice for a more neutral interior. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? products.title: William Morris Compton Buttercup Roller Blind
products.description: A stunning conversational piece, the compton buttercup roller blind comes with a story to tell. Part of their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, compton was produced in 1896 for compton hall, near wolverhampton, the house of laurence w. Hodson. Originally a stunning conversational piece, the compton buttercup roller blind comes with a story to tell.

Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme.
